name: get_further_contents
description: Get detailed results from retrievaled URL.

request_url.desciption: URL of the desired web page.

name: get_nobel_results
description: Search for information about the Nobel Prize.

nobelPrizeCategory.desciption: The category of the Nobel Prize, select from che, eco, lit, pea, phy and med

name: google_events_search
description: search events with a location name.

query.desciption: Keywords to query, the input should be a location, like US.

name: wiki_search
description: Search relative knowledge about input entity name from wikipedia.

name: google_autocomplete_search
description: Automatically complete search querys using google.

name: google_related_question_search
description: Search question others asked on google which relate to the query.

query.desciption: Keywords or phrases to constrain the recommend.

name: google_patents_search
description: Search patents relate to the query on google.

query.desciption: Keywords or phrases to query, the query should be a acceptable location, like US.

name: google_local_services_search
description: Search local services with a location.

query.desciption: Services keywords you want to find.

location.desciption: Your location to provide nearby services, like New York.

name: google_scholar_search
description: Search local services with a location.

query.desciption:
Parameter defines the query you want to search. You can also use helpers in your query such as: author:, or source:.

Usage of cites parameter makes q optional. Usage of cites together with q triggers search within citing articles.

cites.desciption: Parameter defines unique ID for an article to trigger Cited By searches. Usage of cites will bring up a list of citing documents in Google Scholar. Example value: cites=1275980731835430123. Usage of cites and q parameters triggers search within citing articles.

as_ylo.desciption: Parameter defines the year from which you want the results to be included. (e.g. if you set as_ylo parameter to the year 2018, the results before that year will be omitted.). This parameter can be combined with the as_yhi parameter.

num.desciption: Parameter defines the maximum number of results to return, limited to 20. (e.g., 10 (default) returns 10 results, 20 returns 20 results).

name: ask_to_user
description: You can ask user for guidance when you think you need more information to handle the task, but you should use this tool as less as you can.

question.desciption: The question you want to ask to user.

name: finish
description: Finish the task and give your answer.
